description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A precision break in program for Plasma TVs.  For those who think break in is a good thing.  Colors cycle through full RGB range (0-255), with the values changing by one every 34 milliseconds.
description.short: A precision break in program for Plasma TVs.  For those who think break in is a good thing.  Colors cycle through full RGB range (0-255), with the values changing by one every 34 milliseconds.
